attribution: Designed by the Day 1A players at Magnum Opus
stripped_text: After you resolve this event, end your action phase. Make a run on a remote server. If successful, remove the first non-agenda card that you access from the game. Until the game ends, whenever you access a copy of that card, remove it from the game. Limit 1 per deck.
text:
After you resolve this event, end your action phase.
Make a run on a remote server. If successful, remove the first non-agenda card that you access from the game.
Until the game ends, whenever you access a copy of that card, remove it from the game.
Limit 1 per deck.
title: Watch the World Burn
